title: Mafia : The City of Lost Heaven (Soundtrack)
description:
,       #########################################################
	#							#
	#	Mafia: The City of Lost Heaven (Soundtrack)	#
	#							#
	#########################################################





fileinfo for most of the tracks:

	MPEG 1 Audio, Layer 3 (MP3)
	128 kbps





My words:

I downloaded soundtracks from Mafia once, but I wasn't pleased, so I made some research and downloaded more tracks thats in the game and put names on them and wrote some info.

These track are in alphabetic order, because this is not an album so track-numbers would not seem right.

Info about where i got the information and files is in the nfo-file because i don't know if OK to write it on the piratebay.

Now enjoy the good music till you hear from me again, when Mafia II releases ;)






date:	12-04-2009
by:	Clintwood at thepiratebay.se
